review: I love this device SO MUCH MORE than I anticipated. We own a lot of devices like this (apple tv, roku, play stations, xboxes, etc). But this one became a family favorite because we can jam it in a small pocket of a backpack and bring it with us when we travel. As long as we can find decent wifi connection we can then appease the 4 year old with some cartoons or we can catch up on some mom and dad relaxation / viewing anywhere we go. Was brilliant to have when visiting friends and family. Also worked in a number of hotels we stayed at. When not traveling it lives in our bedroom attached to an extra TV so mom and dad can watch netflix in bed. We got this for the super low introductory price of $19 and I appreciate that value every time we use it. $39 price point is fair and still recommended, especially if you don't already have roku or apple tv.
